TopicTitle: A new science experiment involving pitch tar dropping

Articles.Content: This experiment would require a very long time to complete in shallow gravity wells but could be accelerated by having the craft under thrust.  Player would get one science point for every pitch drop dropped, with a bonus of 2 extra science points and unlock cryogenic hybernation if they exceed 10,000 drops.

Step 1: pitch drop experiment

Step 2: wait

Step 3: torch drives

This would be a perfect end-game experiment though - the entirety of the Kerbal Empire is shifted from making paperclips to dropping as much pitch as possible
